## AdapterInterface.findById() method

Finds the document by id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findById(id: string, options?: any): Promise<Datamodel>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | Id of the document |
|  options | any | <i>(Optional)</i> Object containing options. Options may be databse specific. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Datamodel&gt;
